column3: secp256k1 shouldn't be installed as part of bitcoin, like `leveldb` and `json-spirit` it is included only as a dependency to bitcoin.\nUse the upstream repository if you want to install secp256k1 as a library: https://github.com/bitcoin/secp256k1/ . This will also yield a shared library and will be more up-to-date.\n
Agreed. DIST_SUBDIRS was used for the reasons that @laanwj pointed out.\n
